name: Cheese maze (itch)
description:
Guide the cheese wheel through the falling obstacles and see how long you last.

week 2 in 52 weeks of game dev

use one finger on each of the red touch-pads to control the position and rotation of the platform. if the cheese wheel touches an obstacle or falls out of the screen you lose.

music is Cheese by David Szestay obtained from frrmusicarchive
licenced under Attribution-NonComercial 3.0 International Licence
